alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 7:54AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Queens, Kings and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 830 AM EDT... At 754 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Battery Park, or near Jersey City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Flatbush, Crown Heights, Forest Hills, Canarsie, Lower East Side, Howard Beach, Ozone Park, Brooklyn Heights, Battery Park, Park Slope, Bensonhurst and Greenpoint. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Southern Queens
